Package client.controller

responsible for all the controllers

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IClientController  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardResponseController
    Tells the client whether the model is locked or not BY SOME OTHER CLIENT.
    ConnectResponseController
    Connect Response after receiving the corresponding message from server
    ControllerChain
    Chain Repository
    CreateGameController
    Controllers to handle interaction When the player request to create a game, a createGameRequest will be sent to the server
    EmptyHandler
    responsible for handling error for Chain Repository
    ExitGameController
    make a request to the server for exit game
    ExitGameResponseController
    Controllers to handle the received ExitGameResponse, set Playing panel invisible and exit the java program
    FindWordController
    responsible for send the findWordRequest, send the fond words' XML to server the FindWordController.process()send the fond words in XML format and sent to the server
    FindWordResponseController
    responsible to handle the findWord response from server
    JoinGameController
    responsible for make a join game request to the server
    JoinGameResponseController
    responsible for handling the response of join game response from server
    ListGamesController
    responsible for making a request of listing current games in server
    ListGamesResponseController
    responsible for handling listGamesResponse from server
    LockGameController
    responsible for making a lock game request to server
    LockGameResponseController
    responsible for handling the lockGameResponse from server, lock the game when receive the lockGameResponse the LockGameResponseController.process(Message)handle the LockGameResponse, lock the game and set lockGame button grey
    MoveBoardController
    controller that is responsible to send a moveBoard request to server theMoveBoardController.process()send the repositionRequest to server according to which button(left, right, up or down) pressed
    PaintCellController
    responsible for painting cells according to the cell's status.
    PickWordController
    responsible for picking word
    ResetGameController
    responsible to send a reset game request to server theResetGameController.process()send the resetGameRequest to the server
    ResetGameResponseController
    responsible for handling the resetGame response from server
    SampleClientMessageHandler
    Sample implementation of a protocol handler to respond to messages received from the server.
    TestBoardResponseController
    this test case is responsible for testing the board response controller
    TestConnectResponseController
    this test case is responsible for testing connect response controller
    TestCreateGameController
    this test case is responsible for testing create game controller, which sends a request to the server
    TestExitGameController
    this test case is responsible for testing exit game controller
    TestExitGameResponseController  
    TestFindWordController
    this test case is responsible for testing findWord Controller
    TestFindWordResponseController
    this test case is responsible for testing the findWord Response Controller
    TestJoinGameController
    this test case is responsible for testing the join game controller
    TestJoinGameResponseController
    this test case is responsible for testing join game response controller
    TestListGamesController
    this test case is responsible for testing the list games controller
    TestListGamesResponseController
    this test case is responsible for testing the list game response controller
    TestLockGameController
    this test case is responsible for testing the lock game controller
    TestLockGameResponseController
    this test case is responsible for testing the lock game response controller
    TestMoveBoardController
    this test case is responsible for testing the move board controller
    TestPickWordController
    this test case is responsible for testing pick word controller should initialize application, playingpanel views and model, word, cell, board entities and mock mouseEvents
    TestResetGameController
    this test case is responsible for testing the reset game controller
    TestResetGameResponseController
    this test case is responsible for testing the reset game response controller
